movie_title: We Need to Rethink Exercise (Updated Version)
introduction: Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day t

vocabulary.definition: deliberately destroy, damage, or obstruct (something), especially for political or military advantage.
vocabulary.example: Your body is sabotaging you every step of the way in your weight loss journey.

vocabulary.definition: the branch of physical science that deals with the relations between heat and other forms of energy.
vocabulary.example: Your body is a biological machine that follows the laws of thermodynamics to function.

vocabulary.definition: relating to immunity or an immune response.
vocabulary.example: Your immune system immuns to protect your body from harmful pathogens.

vocabulary.definition: a short and amusing or interesting story about a real incident or person.
vocabulary.example: The online discussion is full of personal anecdotes about weight loss experiences.

vocabulary.definition: a localized physical condition in which part of the body becomes reddened, swollen, hot, and often painful, especially as a reaction to injury or infection.
vocabulary.example: Chronic inflammation can lead to serious diseases, affecting overall health.

vocabulary.definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions.
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise makes you more resilient to stress and improves overall well-being.
